member.name: CRL_FIND_ISSUED_FOR_PARA
member.summary: The CRL_FIND_ISSUED_FOR_PARA structure contains the certificate contexts of both a subject and a certificate issuer. For more information, see.

member.name: CRL_FIND_ISSUED_FOR_PARA.pSubjectCert
member.summary: A pointer to a subject's certificate context.

member.name: CRL_FIND_ISSUED_FOR_PARA.pIssuerCert
member.summary: A pointer to a certificate issuer's certificate context.
